programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: The team must take down a dangerous drug ring after an American diplomat is killed while being used as a pawn; Jubal and OA try to help friends from their past fight off their inner demons.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: When a controversial senior leader from Egypt comes to New York for a heart transplant, OA struggles to balance his personal opinion with his professional duty when he is assigned to the security detail.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: After a decorated FBI agent is murdered, the team investigates and learns that the man led a double life; Maggie struggles with what information she should reveal to the agent's widow, who is also her personal friend.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: A woman who has information about the death of Maggie's husband is abducted, leading OA and the team to uncover a criminal operation larger than anyone imagined; Dana puts her career in jeopardy when she allows Maggie to work on the case.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: After a bomb detonates at a restaurant in Queens, the case becomes personal for OA, who grew up eating there; OA goes under cover to prevent another incident.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: After the son of a prominent blogger is kidnapped, the team must sweep through her two million followers to find the culprit; Kristen continues to adjust to life as a field agent with her new partner Stuart Scola.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: The murder of Velda's artist boyfriend sends Hammer into a landscape filled with ego and extortion; art dealers and old flames are all suspects in the case.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: Allegations against Hammer's ex-girlfriend put the private eye in the middle of a show business murder mystery.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: An ex-con uses his dinner with Hammer as an alibi when a thief matching his description steals a revolutionary microchip.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: An organized crime leader tries to buy stolen defense technology; Deeks is kicked out of NCIS training only to find that Hetty has a life-changing surprise for him.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When Sam's daughter is kidnapped after leading citywide protests, he will stop at nothing to find her; Deeks rejoins NCIS; Callen searches for answers about Anna.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When Callen goes to the National Counterterrorism Center on the pretext of interrogating a Russian asset from the crashed plane case he investigated months earlier, the tables are turned and he is accused of being a Russian agent.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: Can't Take My Eyes off You
programme.desc: After Callen receives a cryptic message from Hetty, he tracks down the person tailing him, bringing him to a remote location teeming with Russians -- and face to face with Anna.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: To rescue Joelle from further torture by the Russians, Callen and the team must offer up Anna as bait to Katya; Callen finally discovers who accused him of being a Russian spy.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Dawson and Casey's relationship is tested as the team responds to a truck leaking hydrochloric acid in a busy intersection; Severide learns about Brittany's past; Mouch has dating troubles.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A house fire puts a couple in danger; Dawson and Casey are pushed apart; the Chicago Holiday Fest gives Molly's II a chance to shine.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Two members of the firehouse go missing after a routine call; Casey and Dawson struggle to balance their personal and professional lives; Boden and Donna learn their baby has potential complications.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Evidence at a storage unit fire seems to be connected to the blaze that took Shay's life; Chaplain Orlovsky is in a car accident.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The pursuit of a missing teenager leaves Mills and Brett stranded in unforgiving elements; members of the firehouse care for an abandoned newborn; Severide receives an intriguing proposal; Boden is at odds with his father (Richard Roundtree).

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A temporary chief fills in for Boden, who is forced to take some time off for personal reasons; Lt. Severide deals with an unwelcome addition to the squad; Brett becomes close to a girl she previously rescued; Casey starts seeing a new woman.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide steps in when Chief Pridgen tries to shift blame for a tactical error onto Casey; Mouch learns he fathered a child through a sperm donation; Brett and Cruz take Dawson on a double date.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide talks to Chief Boden for an old friend who needs a second chance with the fire department; Mills endeavors to regain his active status; Brett and Dawson decide they need a night out.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Herrmann tries to rescue a toddler from a structure fire; Mills discovers unexpected news; Brett and Cruz's relationship reaches a critical juncture; Otis is surprised by some feelings that develop.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Members of Firehouse 51 transport victims of a gas leak to nearby Chicago Med; an armed patient claiming to be carrying a deadly airborne disease forces Chicago Med into lockdown.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.sub-title: You Know Where to Find Me
programme.desc: Mills works to save the life of a driver injured in a car wreck; Casey harbors doubts about Jack Nesbitt; Hermann, Otis, Cruz and Chaplain Orlovsky ready their team for the peewee hockey championship.
